name: The Legend of Zelda™: Hyrule Historia
description: The Legend of Zelda™ franchise has set the industry for riveting game play and immersive story lines. With each game the player discovered a story of destinies intertwined and heroes emerging from humble beginnings to overcome the most impossible of odds. Now, take an in-depth look at the creation of one of the most beloved gaming franchises of all time. Containing never-before-seen concept art, character designs, the official chronology of the games, the history of Hyrule, and much more!
